name: Don't Eat My Babies
description:
Play as a strange alien creature defending her brood in this turn-based tactical smasher.

My entry for Ludum Dare 37

POST-COMP NOTE: Based on player feedback I made 1 change: the roll now ends in an attack. This lets you have more fun when juggling the defense of multiple eggs. The original version submitted for the compo remains available - judge appropriately!
